titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

action.text: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Sanders. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes the Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions to make specified expenditures and employ personnel for the 118th Congress.
